subject: Re: Can TestRunner run classes from a jar file ?
msgSnippet: Look in the Files section in the src folder. ... to ... load
messageBody:
Look in the Files section in the src folder.

--- In junit@y..., "manishdk" <manishdk@y...> wrote:
> We are creating a jar file for all the Junit tests. Is it possible
to
> execute the suite using TestRunner?
>
> TestCaseClassLoader says that right now it is the limitation to
load
> classes from a jar file? Is there a workaround ?
>
> Since the structure is quite spread out. Eg:
